00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Linq;
00026 using System.Text;
00027 using System.Management;
00028 using System.Collections;
00029 #endregion
00030 
00031 namespace Utilities.Environment.DataTypes
00032 {
00036     public class Applications:IEnumerable
00037     {
00038         #region Constructor
00039 
00046         public Applications(string Name = "", string UserName = "", string Password = "")
00047         {
00048             try
00049             {
00050                 LoadApplications(Name, UserName, Password);
00051             }
00052             catch { throw; }
00053         }
00054 
00055         #endregion
00056 
00057         #region Properties
00058 
00059         public List<Application> ApplicationList { get; set; }
00060 
00061         #endregion
00062 
00063         #region Private Functions
00064 
00071         private void LoadApplications(string Name, string UserName, string Password)
00072         {
00073             try
00074             {
00075                 ApplicationList = new List<Application>();
00076                 ManagementScope Scope = null;
00077                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00078                 {
00079                     ConnectionOptions Options = new ConnectionOptions();
00080                     Options.Username = UserName;
00081                     Options.Password = Password;
00082                     Scope = new ManagementScope("\\\\" + Name + "\\root\\default", Options);
00083                 }
00084                 else
00085                 {
00086                     Scope = new ManagementScope("\\\\" + Name + "\\root\\default");
00087                 }
00088                 ManagementPath Path = new ManagementPath("StdRegProv");
00089                 using (ManagementClass Registry = new ManagementClass(Scope, Path, null))
00090                 {
00091                     const uint HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE = unchecked((uint)0x80000002);
00092                     object[] Args = new object[] { HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, @"SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall", null };
00093                     uint MethodValue = (uint)Registry.InvokeMethod("EnumKey", Args);
00094                     string[] Keys = Args[2] as String[];
00095                     using (ManagementBaseObject MethodParams = Registry.GetMethodParameters("GetStringValue"))
00096                     {
00097                         MethodParams["hDefKey"] = HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE;
00098                         foreach (string SubKey in Keys)
00099                         {
00100                             MethodParams["sSubKeyName"] = @"SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\" + SubKey;
00101                             MethodParams["sValueName"] = "DisplayName";
00102                             using (ManagementBaseObject Results = Registry.InvokeMethod("GetStringValue", MethodParams, null))
00103                             {
00104                                 if (Results != null && (uint)Results["ReturnValue"] == 0)
00105                                 {
00106                                     Application Temp = new Application();
00107                                     Temp.Name = Results["sValue"].ToString();
00108                                     ApplicationList.Add(Temp);
00109                                 }
00110                             }
00111                         }
00112                     }
00113                 }
00114             }
00115             catch { throw; }
00116         }
00117 
00118         #endregion
00119 
00120         #region IEnumerable
00121 
00122         public IEnumerator GetEnumerator()
00123         {
00124             return ApplicationList.GetEnumerator();
00125         }
00126 
00127         #endregion
00128     }
00129 }
